channel.title: Analogx on Malicious Link
channel.description: Recent content in Analogx on Malicious Link

item.title: Lab Setup - Windows Proxy and Egress Filtering
item.description: pfSenseÂ is an excellent free way of including a firewall / ids / proxy in your lab or VMs. It runs small and fast, but even as simple as pfsense is sometimes you need a bit less complexity and speed of configuration. Enter Peerblock and AnalogX’s proxy. Two free tools, one usually used to stop people who torrent from getting caught by the RIAA/MPAA and the other a drop dead simple windows based proxy utility.
